name: CLM_REV_CNTR_STUS_CD
title: Revenue Center Payment Method Indicator Code
description: THE DOMAIN OF CLAIM PAYMENT METHOD CODES.

concept.display: SERVICES NOT PAID UNDER OPPS; PAID UNDER FEE SCHEDULE OR OTHER PAYMENT SYSTEM (EFFECTIVE 1/1/2023- INCLUDES UNCLASSIFIED DRUGS AND BIOLOGICALS REPORTABLE UNDER HCPCS CODE C9399)
